name: Asparagus Primavera
description: A perfect pasta night recipe with fresh asparagus.
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, boil noodles for 4â€“6 minutes, until tender. Just before draining, add asparagus and zucchini and boil for about 1 minute, until tender-crisp. Set aside 1 cup cooking water, then drain.

Return noodles and vegetables to pot. Stir in oil, lemon peel and juice, Herb & Garlic Dip Mix and spinach. Moisten with some of the reserved water, if necessary. Spoon into bowls and top with ricotta.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.
